paragraph1: Beyond the lines of code, there's a whole life that defines me. I'm the father of an amazing son and husband to a wife who supports me in every decision - my family is my most important project and my greatest motivation to grow every day.
paragraph2: The discipline I bring to work comes from my years in the military: waking up early, staying focused, and never giving up in the face of obstacles. This mindset shaped who I am today, both as a professional and as a person.
paragraph3: In my free time, you'll find me planning the next family trip, playing video games to unwind, or... coding yet another personal project. I confess: when you love what you do, the line between work and hobby disappears.
closing: Family, focus, and code. That's what drives me.
